name: Dophin Lesuire Centre to B2272 Public Footpath

ai.summary: A gentle 3.3 km easy walk from Dophin Lesuire Centre to B2272 Public Footpath in the UK. The route is suitable for beginners and families, combining urban pavements with short stretches of grass and gravel, and offering straightforward navigation with light terrain.
ai.terrain_summary: Predominantly flat with a mix of paved footpaths, compact gravel, and occasional grassy or muddy sections. Some stretches may be uneven; good footwear is recommended, especially after rain.
ai.safety_notes: An easy route, but stay alert at road crossings along the B2272 and respect private access where posted. Check the forecast and daylight hours before setting off. Wear sturdy footwear and bring a waterproof layer and a small amount of water. Carry a map or GPS and keep your phone charged. Stay on designated paths and watch for mud or slippery surfaces after rain.
recommended_gear: Comfortable walking shoes or lightweight hiking boots
Map or offline map on a smartphone, and a fully charged phone
ai.best_seasons: All year round; best in spring and summer for dry conditions and longer daylight. In autumn and winter, allow extra time and wear warm clothing.
